_header: Saint Jacques in the land of Persia of great high men come
Subjects: saints’ lives; Jacques (James Intercisus) the martyr, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Jacques the Martyr in the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint ieme in þe lond of perce of hyȝe men comesone he
                    let þe false laue & tok to cristindome…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…nouȝ god for þe gret ioye þat seint Iakes
                    haddebrynge vs to þilke ioye þat seint Iakes hadde

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint Iakes in þe lond of perce of gret heie men comsone he let þe false lawe & toc to cristendom…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe grete torment þat sein Iakes here haddebring vs to þilke ioie þat þe angel his soule ladde
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxxv” added to left margin by later hand (f. 201v).

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint Iakes in þe londe of pers of heie men comSone he let þe false lawe & tok to cristindom…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou god vor þe grete torment þat Seint Iakes haddeBringe ous to þulke ioie þer angeles is soule ladde
